scripts.dev:auth: npm run build:shared && npm -w services/auth-service run dev
scripts.dev:account: npm run build:shared && npm -w services/account-service run dev
scripts.dev:transaction: npm run build:shared && npm -w services/transaction-service run dev
scripts.dev:notification: npm run build:shared && npm -w services/notification-service run dev
scripts.dev:all: npm run build:shared && concurrently -n auth,account,tx,notif -c auto "npm run dev:auth" "npm run dev:account" "npm run dev:transaction" "npm run dev:notification"
